titles.title: Beautifying Federal Civic Architecture Act of 2025
Beautifying Federal Civic Architecture Act of 2025
To prescribe Guiding Principles for Federal Architecture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.
